ànzhōng in the dark; in secret; on the sly; surreptitiously

traditional: 暗地裡
àndelǐ secretly; inwardly; on the sly
ànshì darkroom
ànhài kill secretly; stab in the back
ànàn secretly; inwardly

traditional: 暗殺
ànshā assassinate
ànliú undercurrent
ànshì drop a hint; hint; suggest; suggestion
ànxiào laugh in (up) one's sleeve; snigger; snicker

traditional: 暗線
ànxiàn darkline
ànzì inwardly; to oneself; secretly

traditional: 暗號
ànhào secret signal (sign); countersign; cipher
hēiàn dark; darkly; darkness
hūjiào to shout; to yell

traditional: 呼應
hūyīng echoed; echo
hūjiù to call for help

traditional: 呼聲
hūshēng voiced opinion or desire, usually associated with a group

traditional: 嗚呼
wūhū alack
dǎzhāohu (v) greet sb by word or action; (v) give prior notice
zhāohu to call out to sb; to greet sb; to inform sb; to instruct sb to do sth; to take care of sb

traditional: 歡呼
huānhū cheer for; acclaim

traditional: 稱呼
chēnghu to call; to address as; appellation

traditional: 罷了
bàle a modal particle indicating (that's all, only, nothing much)
bàliǎo a modal particle indicating (don't mind it, ok)

traditional: 罷免
bàmiǎn recall

traditional: 罷官

traditional: 罷工

traditional: 罷市

traditional: 罷課
bàkè student's strike

qǔqiǎo joker
kěqiǎo by happy coincidence
xiǎoqiǎo lively

traditional: 靈巧
